sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SUEVI, the Catti or Chatti of Cæsar (Strabo), placed on the Rhine : the reaſon of Caeſar’s calling them thus does not appear, though conſiderably diſtant from the proper Suevi or Alemanni.
Suevi (Tacitus), a common name of the people ſituated between the Elbe and the Viſtula, diſtinguished otherwise by particular names ; as in Ptolemy, Suevi Angeli, Suevi Sennones.
